title: Extend the Project Initializer
description: Add a new project template to the initializer. Create a 'cli' template for command-line applications that includes argparse setup, a main entry point, and appropriate project structure.
instructions:
Create a new template module called cli_template.py that:
1. Defines REQUIREMENTS with click or argparse
2. Defines STRUCTURE with src/, tests/, and docs/ directories
3. Defines MAIN_CODE with a CLI skeleton using argparse
4. Implements get_template() to return the configuration
5. Register your template in templates/__init__.py

hints.text: Follow the pattern from web_template.py and data_template.py. Your get_template() function should return a dictionary with 'requirements', 'structure', 'main_code', and 'description' keys.

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to return a dictionary from get_template()
commonMistakes.consequence: TypeError when the main application tries to access template keys
commonMistakes.correction: Return a dict with all required keys: requirements, structure, main_code, description
